name: deprecating
content:
deprecating adjective
(NOT VALUING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
showing that you think something is of little value or importance: Her deprecating smile clearly showed that she thought I'd said something stupid. See also
self-deprecating formal
showing that you feel embarrassed, especially by praise: She reacted to his compliments with a deprecating laugh.

You can also find related words, phrases, and synonyms in the topics:
Shy and modest
deprecating adjective
(NOT APPROVING)
formal showing that you do not approve of something: The teacher gave the boys a deprecating stare.
